name: Project Miko (Alpha Build)
description:
Step up to the plate in Project Miko ⚾

Join Hanami and her fox-spirit guide Kousuke on an adventure as she combines her passion with her duty in order to restore balance to the seasons!

Use your trusty baseball bat, throwing arm, and spirit form to bonk snow spirits and solve puzzles. Talk to Kousuke for help or to learn more about the realm of spirits!

Alpha Build Survey 📝

After playing our game, please fill out this survey! 
We want to learn from your experience to improve Project Miko~

Credits ❤️

Project Miko is currently in development by Chonkers HQ, a team of 10 undergraduate students studying game design at the University of California Santa Cruz!

DESIGN: Eli Miller, Andrew Xu, Anfernee Lai, Avery Weibel

PROGRAMMING: Andrew Xu, Anfernee Lai, Avery Weibel

ART: Angela Do, Angela Jiang, Annie Zhang, Sandy Sang

NARRATIVE: Joseph Wang

SOUND: Eli Miller, Michael Sim

PRODUCER: Michael Sim

FOLLOW US ON TWITTER: @ChonkersHQ
